snippet.title: A Ghost in the Gallery
snippet.description:
Explore the ART gallery like never before as you join Bop and Ghostie in the search for his missing dog over Halloween Night!

A Ghost in the Gallery dives into the Pulpy world of ART-O-Ween in an interactive comic using the ingenious Panels Comic framework by Cadin Batrack!

https://ledbetter-games.itch.io/ghost
https://cadin.github.io/panels/
